alert.note: Alert for Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 2:32PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Niobrara County through 300 PM MDT... At 232 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Redbird, or 16 miles southwest of Edgemont, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mule Creek Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
